*Scope of Work*:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC/PSPC) requires the services of a qualified general contractor to provide all construction work necessary to complete electrical and mechanical repair and replacement of the pendulum clock system on the Walpole Island swing bridge. Among the other specifications, a minimum of 10% of the total tender amount should be set aside for *Local Content* opportunities, including local labour, materials, and services from the Walpole Island First Nation (WIFN).

Selection Factors
------------------

The scope of services for this engineering and construction project will be determined by a ranking of participants based on their biddings.
 The lowest price among participating contractors and vendors will be awarded the contract. If the contract is tendered and not awarded due to the absence or inadequate negotiation of necessary permits or special permits, the author or a third-party contractor may award contracts based upon price factors alone.
